iati-activity.title: Tanzania One UN Center
iati-activity.description: Tanzania One UN Center project aims to ensure the Tanzania Government and the UN to attain common UN House in Dar es Salaam to advance Delivering as One reform five pillars: One Programme; One Leader; One Fund; One Office; and One Voice
iati-activity.participating-org: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED REPUBLIC OF TANZANI

iati-activity.title: Joint Programme to support Productive Social Safety Nets
iati-activity.description: This project aims to create opportunities for decent jobs and secure livelihoods. It will accelerate progress on eradicating extreme poverty and reach all the extreme poor people living below the food poverty line
iati-activity.participating-org: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

iati-activity.title: Social Protection Programme
iati-activity.description: This project aims to create opportunities for decent jobs and secure livelihoods. It will contribute to implementation of MDG Acceleration Framework

iati-activity.title: Strengthening Access to Justice in Tanzania
iati-activity.description: The support aims to strengthen the Ministry of Constitutional and Legal Affairs for improving justice delivery and increasing access for the poor an marginalized men and women especially in the remote areas
